text: Lo Mejor de A.B. Quintanilla III y Los Kumbia Kings (English: The Best of A.B. Quintanilla III and Los Kumbia Kings) is the fifth compilation album and twelfth album by Mexican-American cumbia group A.B. Quintanilla y Los Kumbia Kings. It was released on July 1, 2016 by EMI Latin. Lo Mejor de A.B. Quintanilla III y Los Kumbia Kings is the second album to be released after the breakup of Kumbia Kings. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" !Chart (2016) !Peak position |- |US Billboard Latin Pop Albums |align="center"|13 |} ==References== Category:2016 greatest hits albums Category:Kumbia Kings albums Category:A.B. Quintanilla albums Category:Albums produced by A.B. Quintanilla Category:Albums produced by Cruz Martínez Category:EMI Latin compilation albums Category:Spanish-language compilation albums Category:Cumbia albums
title: Lo Mejor de A.B. Quintanilla III y Los Kumbia Kings
